answers.answer: Most doctors won't allow it til 36 weeks, and you really don't want your baby having breathing issues, your lucky to get out of it by a few weeks, I would wait it out!
You can take capsules orally in a dosage as stated on the bottle. You can use two capsules inserted vaginally ( as near to your cervix as possible before bed ) from 37 weeks.
I'd wait till closer to 36/37 weeks. With my two other pregnancies I started it at 36 weeks and delivered after 37 weeks!
I used it at 37w4d and broke one capsule open at bedtime an rubbed it on my belly. I delivered three days later. You should wait til you are full term before trying anything.
I was being induced within a week due to preeclampsia, otherwise I wouldn't have even used it.

Thanx ladies, I haven't planned using it since ill be induced in two weeks, but was just curious. If the induction didn't take place.... hope everyone is doin well... im 35 weeks and 1 day. I been havin contractions this evening. Nothing steady, but for a first time mama not knowing what to expect is scaryyyy

question: Hey ladies,I've read alot about evening primrose oil on here. I had a friend use it back in the day and it surely worked for her. what im wondering how early can I take it? I am 35 weeks and 2 days. They are inducing me at 37-38 weeks, im nervoussss but want him out. Lol
title: Question about primrose oil?
